scripts.name: Lunar Calendar
scripts.author: Texas
scripts.description: It's the witching hour, when demons reign. But... what's this? Someone else is calling the shots now, you're on the Lunar Calendar.
scripts.rule: Either the Lunatic or the Lycanthrope is in play. They are Stormcaught. If a Lunatic is in play, the Demon (or Summoner) chooses what the Lunatic learns about Stormcaught characters, and the evil team learns this. The Faux Paw is universal.
